concept.description: Creates the missing package structure of the JRE.
concept.cypher: MATCH (:Artifact)-[:CONTAINS]->(t:Type) WHERE exists(t.fqn) WITH t, substring(t.fqn, 0, length(t.fqn)-length(t.name)-1) as packageName MERGE (p:Package{fqn:packageName}) MERGE (p)-[:CONTAINS]->(t) RETURN p.fqn, count(t)

concept.description: Creates the missing package structure of the JRE.
concept.cypher: MATCH (p1:Package)-[:CONTAINS]->(t1:Type), (p2:Package)-[:CONTAINS]->(t2:Type), (t1)-[typeDependsOn:DEPENDS_ON]->(t2) WHERE p1 <> p2 WITH p1, p2, count(typeDependsOn) as weight, sum(typeDependsOn.weight) as aggregatedWeight MERGE (p1)-[packageDependsOn:DEPENDS_ON]->(p2) SET packageDependsOn.weight=weight, packageDependsOn.aggregatedWeight=aggregatedWeight RETURN p1.fqn, collect(p2.fqn)
